Sentencas: In the present investigation, the novel glass series xLa(2)O(3)-(10-x)Y2O3-15SrO-15CaO-10B(2)O(3)-10Al(2)O(3)-40SiO(2) (x = 2, 4, 6, 8) has been synthesized by melt quenching technique.
Titulo: Impact of La2O3/Y2O3 ratio on crystallization kinetics of CaO based alumino-borosilicate glasses and compatibility with Crofer and 8YSZ for SOFCs

Sentencas: The characteristic glass temperatures and the inflection point temperature (T-f) for the glasses have been determined by DTA and differential DTA (DDTA), respectively.
Titulo: Impact of La2O3/Y2O3 ratio on crystallization kinetics of CaO based alumino-borosilicate glasses and compatibility with Crofer and 8YSZ for SOFCs

Sentencas: The activation energy is calculated using Kissinger, Moynihan and Augis and Benett models.
Titulo: Impact of La2O3/Y2O3 ratio on crystallization kinetics of CaO based alumino-borosilicate glasses and compatibility with Crofer and 8YSZ for SOFCs

Sentencas: Various kinetic parameters such as fluctuation free volume (f(g)), Hruby parameter (H-r), bulk thermal expansion coefficient (alpha(f)) and k parameters are calculated for studying glass stability with varying La2O3/Y2O3 ratio.
Titulo: Impact of La2O3/Y2O3 ratio on crystallization kinetics of CaO based alumino-borosilicate glasses and compatibility with Crofer and 8YSZ for SOFCs

Sentencas: The amorphous nature and crystalline phase formation has been studied by X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Impact of La2O3/Y2O3 ratio on crystallization kinetics of CaO based alumino-borosilicate glasses and compatibility with Crofer and 8YSZ for SOFCs

Sentencas: Furthermore, the coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) for all the glasses has been calculated.
Titulo: Impact of La2O3/Y2O3 ratio on crystallization kinetics of CaO based alumino-borosilicate glasses and compatibility with Crofer and 8YSZ for SOFCs

Sentencas: The interaction studies of the diffusion couples of glasses with pre-oxidized Crofer 22APU and 8YSZ have been carried out at 850 degrees C. 2 LaY glass is very stable and promising potential sealant for the SOFCs.
Titulo: Impact of La2O3/Y2O3 ratio on crystallization kinetics of CaO based alumino-borosilicate glasses and compatibility with Crofer and 8YSZ for SOFCs
